article_title: Death toll in Gaza climbs to 13,300.
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  at  least  13,300  Palestinians  have  now  been  killed  in  the  enclave  since  Israel's  retaliatory  attacks  began.

article_title: Death toll in Gaza climbs to 13,300.
sentence: Israel  has  been  striking  Gaza  since  Hamas  militants  killed  1,200  Israelis  and  took  more  than  200  people  hostage  in  an  attack  on  7  October.

article_title: Death toll in Gaza climbs to 13,300.
sentence: At  least  5,600  children  and  3,550  women  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  so  far,  the  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says.
